name: Spacero Clash: Alien Shooter
description:
Defeat dreadful monsters and bosses across space in this action-packed shooter adventure. Do you have what it takes to become the king of the universe? Perform better than other players in cash tournaments and win real world prizes. Forget about archery, it’s time to load a space gun and autofire!

• Shoot Enemies With One Finger
Guide your hero to the victory by shooting hideous enemies, dodging fast bullets, and defeating epic bosses, all with only one finger!

• Powerful Weapons
What is the best in a sci-fi shooter? Big weapons!
Laser guns, shotguns, lightning guns, rocket launchers, FLAMETHROWERS!!

• Amazing Graphics
Experience beautiful worlds, fantastic creatures, epic loot, powerful heroes and visual effects in a heroic sci-fi universe!

If you’re a fan of 3D games, sci-fi games, archer games, action RPG games, modern combat shooters, and have a hunger to slay endless hordes of monsters, all for real world prizes then stop waiting and download Spacero Clash now! The world needs heroes like you!

Prize tournaments are not available in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, LA, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don't live in a real prize-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.

If you like the game please take your time to give a positive rating and honest review to support new updates and help making the game even better!

-----------------------------

This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.
publishers: TryAgain Game Studio Korlatolt Felelossegu Tarsasag
